tasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project with TypeScript and Essential Dependencies

tasks.title: Configure Database Schema with Prisma ORM

tasks.details: Install Prisma ORM and configure with SQLite for development (easily switchable to PostgreSQL for production). Design comprehensive schema including: User model (deferred auth but structure ready), Brand model (guidelines, assets, messaging), Campaign model (goals, status, metadata), Journey model (stages, templates), Content model (generated assets, versions, approvals), Template model (journey templates, content templates), and Analytics model (performance tracking). subtasks.title: Implement journey export and import functionality

IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETED

Export/Import functionality fully implemented with comprehensive feature set:

**Core Components Delivered:**
- API endpoints at /api/journeys/export and /api/journeys/import with full CRUD operations
- JourneyExportImport React component with export/import dialogs integrated into JourneyBuilder

**Import Capabilities:**

- Template import system with reusability features

- Import history tracking with metadata and provenance
- Duplicate detection and version compatibility checking

**Technical Implementation:**
- Format validation and comprehensive error handling throughout
- Filename generation utilities with consistent naming conventions
- Data serialization/deserialization with type safety
- Integration with existing Prisma database schema
- Real-time validation feedback in UI components

All specified requirements including batch operations, format validation, error handling, and UI integration have been successfully completed. The system supports multiple export formats and provides robust import validation with graceful error recovery.
</info added on 2025-08-11T22:03:30.987Z>

subtasks.title: Add AI suggestion placeholders with mock data structure
subtasks.description: Create placeholder system for AI-powered stage optimization and content recommendations
subtasks.details:
Design API structure for AI suggestions integration. Create mock data for stage optimization recommendations and content suggestions. Implement suggestion display components and integration points. Add placeholder loading states and error handling for future LLM integration.
<info added on 2025-08-11T22:10:37.156Z>
IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETED - Full AI Suggestion System Deployed

Successfully implemented a comprehensive AI suggestion system with complete architecture for journey optimization and content recommendations.

**Core Implementation Achievements:**

**Data Architecture:** Implemented robust TypeScript interfaces for all suggestion types (optimization, content, strategy, channel, audience) with comprehensive fields including priority, confidence, impact metrics, and reasoning.

**Mock Data System:** Created MockAISuggestions class generating contextually relevant recommendations for each journey stage with realistic performance projections, confidence scoring (0-100), and detailed reasoning.

**API Infrastructure:** Built complete REST endpoints at /api/suggestions/[journeyId] and /api/suggestions/[journeyId]/[suggestionId] with full CRUD operations, request validation, and error handling.

**Service Layer:** Developed AISuggestionService with filtering capabilities, implementation tracking, and architecture ready for future LLM integration.

**UI Components:** Delivered full-featured AISuggestions component with filtering by type/priority/confidence, SuggestionCard with expandable details, type-specific renderers, and implementation tracking with visual feedback.

**Placeholder System:** Created comprehensive loading states, empty states, error handling, and mini preview components for all suggestion contexts.

**React Integration:** Built useAISuggestions hook providing complete state management, real-time filtering, API integration, and automatic statistics computation.

**Journey Builder Integration:** Successfully integrated AI suggestions section into journey builder with stage-specific recommendations and proper loading states throughout.

**Key Features Delivered:** Multi-type suggestion system, priority indicators, confidence star ratings, impact assessments, comprehensive filtering, implementation tracking, batch operations, and responsive mobile-friendly design.

The system provides production-ready foundation for AI-powered journey optimization with realistic mock data quality and comprehensive error handling, fully preparing for future LLM API integration while delivering immediate value through contextual journey recommendations.
</info added on 2025-08-11T22:10:37.156Z>
